(Well, my brother's best friend was over for several days because he's going 
to be going over to Jamaica for two years and be a missionary ::Cough:: waste 
of time ::cough::, so they tied up my computer and I had to use another one 
that had none of my e-mails, links, etc.  So I basically wasted my days in 
MUSHes and reading comics on TransFans and listening to heavy metal, so, eh.  
But now that he's gone, though he may be back Wednesday, I shall try and get 
the IGL started.  

On a more important note, WarBarge will be gone for a large amount of time, I 
think a month or so, so he's given me control of his characters in the IGL, 
as has Hedge who is gone as well.  So I shall be using them)

Oblitercons/Wolfgang/Perndabot/Reptilica/Bloodstryke/Hugar/Thug-Bot/
Punch/Scatterblaster/Nemesis Enforcer/Vehement/Teufel/Otyebis Staff/Ares/
Reflector/Unitron/Firestarter/Shockwave:



The Oblitercons arrived at the Otyebis, several guards escorting them to a 
different corner form all the other combatants where the Gestalt Division 
matches would take place.  They each entered a single hatch.

---

Wolfgang, Perndabot, Bloodstryke, and Reptilica stopped, hatches with each of 
their names above them in view.

"Come on, it's time to win." Wolfgang ordered, each of them entering their 
hatch.

---

Hugar and Thug-Bot entered their hatches, staring inside the metal arenas and 
wondering when their opponents would arrive.

---

Punch arrived outside of the Otyebis, but before he entered he checked his 
plasma cannon and changed to his Counter Punch mode, checking his photon 
rifle, and then reverted to his Punch mode.  He entered the Otyebis with 
escorts of course, going to his hatch and preparing for the fight.

---

One of the soldiers turned to Dameos and took out his datapad.  "Your 
opponent...Noble, is here and on the way here." the soldier replied, 
following his group.

---

The team of soldiers stopped, a hatch for each Cyber with his/her name above 
it.  "Please enter those and await for your match to begin if you would."

=====

"Full retreat!" Nemesis Enforcer yelled, a punch from Vehement nearly 
shattering his entire head.  He fired off ten rapid laser bolts into the 
chest of the Archbishop without much of an effect, another punch smashing in 
his chest.

Transforming to his bat mode he sent a wing slapping forward, knocking 
Vehement off balance.  With that distraction Nemesis Enforcer's boosters 
launched to full power, rocketing him into the sky, Teufel/Zardus' missiles 
missing him by feet, instead the shrapnel striking Vehement.

"No complaints from me, goomba." Scatterblaster replied to Nemesis Enforcer, 
already in the air and undamaged.  He fired down twenty armor-piercing rounds 
down at "Zardus" which struck with mild success.  Rising through the air 
faster he and Nemesis Enforcer blasted off towards Spain.

"I have a match at the IGL thing...why didn't you sign up?"

"What...?" Nemesis Enforcer asked, obviously confused.

"The big ship that landed..."

"Huh?"

"That broadcasted the message for ten hours on all known frequencies...?"

"I must've been asleep.  We can't split up."

"The winner gets a gestalt team but I---"

At the mention of more warriors, Nemesis kicked Scatterblaster hard, 
coincidentally sending him off in the direction of the Otyebis, the psychotic 
robot only hearing Nemesis yells for him to win.

---

Back on the ground an angry Vehement looked to Teufel.  "I must take part in 
a competition, but I will have a replacement come." Vehement said, Teufel 
only nodding and resuming his search for whatever Unicron wanted.

Activating his inner monologue comm. he contacted Reflector.  "Reflector, I 
have a mission from the Chaos-Bringer himself."

~I am ready to serve the Chaos-Bringer~

"Good.  Come to Teufel's coordinates, bring Sun Crusher along with you.  
Teufel will fill you in.  He will charading as Zardus in case of trouble, so 
do not fire on him when you arrive here."

~Understood, Archbishop~

"I'm on my way," Vehement told Teufel as he flew through the air at his top 
speed towards the Otyebis, Teufel merely nodding as he continued his search.

=======

More than two-thirds of the way towards the Ramora, Unitron continued his 
conversation with Vampriza.

"Your offer is to vague and we know not who you are," he replied over the 
comm, "we will need to hear more."

Ares pulled up next to Shockwave and his disembodied voice spoke.

"Emperor Shockwave, I request permission to go to the Otyebis and participate 
in the IGL."

"Very well, waste no energy in attempting to win," he intoned in reply, "but 
be quick.  It would be illogical to waste needed time at the alien craft if 
you lose."

"Understood." Ares said, changing his course towards the Otyebis at full 
speed.

===

A skimmer docked with the Otyebis, Menasor being carried to a secure gestalt 
arena.

---

"Yes, four maximals is fine." one of the Otyebis staff replied to Cledar.  
"Be fast though, we will be beginning soon."

---

One IGL skimmer, carrying Sinew, got a target lock and fired off two 
restraining bolts, one at Strafe and the other at Cliffjumper.  If they 
struck they would fill Cliffjumper and Strafe so full of electricity it would 
temporarily incapacitate them.
